Delivery

Class Truck

  • java.lang.Object
    • Delivery.Truck
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OrdinaryTruck, RefrigeratedTruck

    public abstract class Truck
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract method for all trucks. For both ordinary and refrigerated
    Author:
    Sean O'Connell
